NPP - Temporary Help Services Against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)
=====================================================

**Reference Number:** CB-920-94853322
**Solicitation Number:** S4667843
**Publication Date:** November 08, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 22, 2023, 13:00:00

**Summary:**
The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking proposals for Temporary Help Services under the Supply Arrangement (SA) for the National Capital Region (NCR). The requirement is open to SA holders who have qualified under the Special Advisor stream (13.9) and category.

**Temporary Help Services:**
The DND is looking for Temporary Help Services to support their operations in the NCR. The services required include Special Advisor, which involves providing expert advice and support to the DND on various projects and initiatives.

**Security Requirement:**
The Level of Security Requirement for this contract is Secret. The resources engaged for this project must meet this security standard.

**Eligibility:**
This tender is open to SA holders who are qualified under the Special Advisor stream (13.9) and category under the Supply Arrangement (SA) for the National Capital Region (NCR). The following SA holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

* A Hundred Answers Inc.
* ACOSYS CONSULTING SERVICES INC./SERVICES CONSEILS ACOSYS INC., THE HALIFAX COMPUTER CONSULTING GROUP INC. in Joint Venture
* Altis Recruitment & Technology Inc.
* BDO Canada LLP
* Coradix technology Consulting Ltd.
* Cord3 Innovation Inc.
* CyberVisor Corporation
* DLS Technology Corporation
* IBISKA Telecom Inc.
* Maplesoft Consulting Inc.
* Promaxis Systems Inc
* QMR Staffing Solutions Incorporated
* Raymond Chabot Grant Thornton Consulting Inc.
* TRM Technologies Inc.
* Veritaaq Technology House Inc.

**Proposal Submission:**
Proposal submissions should be sent to the contact information provided below.

**Contact Information:**
CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
Email: [SGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:SGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (613) 971-7955
